description: The Loon Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Loon Mountain for the snow report
Alexa, ask Loon Mountain for latest conditions
imageAltText: Snow Report for Loon Mountain icon
name: Snow Report for Loon Mountain
shortDescription: The Loon Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Loon Mountain.
